articles.author: Adam Wren
articles.title: ‘I promise I’ll behave’: Congress’ most mercurial Republican faces DOGE, Signalgate anger - POLITICO
articles.description: A furious crowd confronted Indiana Rep. Victoria Spartz at a Friday night town hall. And she’s set to do it all over again.
articles.content:
And much of it was fueled by the texting scandal.
I promise Ill behave, said Spartz, the mercurial Capitol Hill character who rejected National Republican Congressional Committee guidance against ho… [+4759 chars]
